On a new deployment of Oxite, I'm trying to use Live Writer to publish a post.  I realize about using FTP for the images. 

The post title is "TEST" and the body is "TEST".  When I try to publish, I'm receiving an HTTP 500 Internal Server Error message.

When attempting to reconfigure the blog, I receive a "500 System.ServiceModel.ServiceActivationException" message.

Does anyone know how to go about resolving this?

I've resolved this issue.  The web.config refers to a ServiceBehavior that doesn't exist.  I changed it to an empty string and it seems to work.

I'm still receiving the 500 error, but now there's a message in the Application Event Log that says "Forms authentication failed for the request.  Reason: The ticket supplied has expired.".

Thoughts?
